Package org.jboss.windup.reporting.config.classification

Interface ClassificationAs

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.Operation, org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Classification
    public interface ClassificationAs
extends org.ocpsoft.rewrite.config.OperationBuilder
    One of the first steps in defining the Classification
    Author:
    Matej Briskar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ClassificationLink with​(Link link)
      Specify the link describing the topic more precisely.
      ClassificationDescription withDescription​(String description)
      Specify the description of the classification and moves to the next step of Classification definition.
      ClassificationEffort withEffort​(int effort)
      Specify the effort that that represents the level of effort required to fix the object.

    • Method Detail

      • withDescription

        ClassificationDescription withDescription​(String description)
        Specify the description of the classification and moves to the next step of Classification definition.
        Parameters:
        description - description of the classification. If you want to specify description. specify it in this step.
        Returns:
        next step of Classification definition

      • with

        ClassificationLink with​(Link link)
        Specify the link describing the topic more precisely. Use this method only if you don't want to specify description
        Parameters:
        link - the Link describing the topic more precisely
        Returns:
        next step of Classification definition

      • withEffort

        ClassificationEffort withEffort​(int effort)
        Specify the effort that that represents the level of effort required to fix the object. Use this only if you don't want to specify description nor any extra link.
        Parameters:
        effort - Effort needed to be put. Will be used to count story points for the whole application.
        Returns:
        next step of Classification definition
